C:/nxpdrv/LPC1700CMSIS/Examples/SSP/sc16is750_polling/sc16is750_polling.c File Reference

This example describes how to use SPP using polling mode, SSP frame format to communicate with SC16IS750/760 Demo board. More...

Defines

#define CS_PORT_NUM   0
#define CS_PIN_NUM   16
#define SC16IS740_WR_CMD(x)   ((uint8_t) (x << 3))
#define SC16IS740_RD_CMD(x)   ((uint8_t) ((x << 3) | 0x80))
#define SC16IS740_IODIR_REG   0x0A
#define SC16IS740_IOSTATE_REG   0x0B
#define SC16IS740_IOCON_REG   0x0E

Functions

void CS_Init (void)
 Initialize CS pin as GPIO function to drive /CS pin due to definition of CS_PORT_NUM and CS_PORT_NUM.
void CS_Force (int32_t state)
 Drive CS output pin to low/high level to select slave device via /CS pin state.

 Print Welcome menu.

Detailed Description

This example describes how to use SPP using polling mode, SSP frame format to communicate with SC16IS750/760 Demo board.
